name: Oriax
description:
Oriax is an action/rhythm roguelike that will test your reflexes. Designed to be the perfect coffee break game, Oriax is made to provide a streamlined and challenging experience. 

In this initial demo version, gameplay is the focus rather than the secondary gameplay elements. Oriax currently features:

  • 5 different classes with different fundamental strengths and weaknesses,
  • 4 different environments,
  • 7 different enemy factions,
  • Infinitely many dungeons and legendary foes to defeat.

Future updates will bring more enemy types, more classes, and better meta-gameplay elements.
